node.excerpt: My daughter Valentina is 4 years and 8 months old and has beeen my “piano student” since she was 3. She just started taking online piano lessons at Yamaha music school since this August. Today, she performed at the Yamaha music school charity concert…

frontmatter.title: Valentina's First Piano Recital
frontmatter.spoiler: My daughter performed my short arrangement of Chopin's Nocturne Op 9 No 2 at her first recital!

node.excerpt: I did a cover version of A Spray of Plum Blossoms (一剪梅), which is perhaps better known as Xue Hua Piao Piao Bei Feng Xiao Xiao.  Motivation This oldie Chinese song has become really trending in English-speaking countries, so I thought it’d be cool to…

frontmatter.title: Xue Hua Piao Piao
frontmatter.spoiler: I made a cover song with the virtual singer and my four-year-old daughter.
